item.title: ‘Big Bang Theory’s Jim Parsons Slams Trump Administration for Ending LGBTQ Crisis Hotline: “It’s Quite Literally Criminal”
item.description: The 988 National Suicide & Crisis Lifeline’s “Press 3” option was shut down on July 17.
